data: A brilliant light streamed from the open doorway of No. 1, Lytton Avenue, making a lane of flame across the pavement, touching pinched gaunt faces that formed a striking contrast to the dazzling scene within.
White, Fred M. (Fred Merrick), 1859-1935; Smith, A. T. (A. Talbot), 1877- [Illustrator]
